1.author: Solid Core Games
1.title: AssetBuilder Tools Free Demo
1.description: UE4 - Align Actors in Editor using tools like in 3ds max

2.author: RonanMahonArt
2.title: Fabric Materials - 56 Pack
2.description: 56 PBR Fabric Materials - Game and Arch Viz Ready, ideal for both environments and characters. Created at 4K resolution

3.author: Mana Station
3.title: Multistory Dungeons
3.description: Package contains over 350 models to build stylized dungeons for top-down and first-person games.

4.author: Dekogon Studios
4.title: City Subway Train - Modular
4.description: This project includes a set of modular meshes and simple blueprint setups to create a subway train. All assets, materials, and vfx created in the Unreal Engine at production ready quality. Each asset was created for realistic AAA quality visuals, style, and budget.

5.author: Scott Buckley
5.title: Freedom
5.description: ‘Freedom’ is a bold, uplifting orchestral track, imbued with ideas of exploration, and the pioneering spirit.

6.author: Scott Buckley
6.title: Ashes of a Fallen Year - Remaster
6.description: A 2019 remaster of an old track! ‘Ashes’ is a simple, uplifting orchestral track with acoustic drums and strings. The new version has more emphasis on solo strings (violin and cello).

7.author: Scott Buckley
7.title: Skyscraper Samba
7.description: Elevator music, pure and simple. Three versions are provided: Full Mix, EQ’d (for the elevator speaker experience), and EQ’d + Less Drums (heard above), which has a simpler, more comedic vibe.

8.author: Scott Buckley
8.title: Ascension
8.description: Sweeping orchestra, with a touch of sadness, a pinch of melancholy, but a smidgeon of hope for balance – a modern tone poem for the trials of overcoming adversity. A simple, distorted synth helps drive the orchestra forward.

9.author: Scott Buckley
9.title: Childhood
9.description: Simple piano and strings, evoking the naivety of childhood.

10.author: Scott Buckley
10.title: Computations in a Snowstorm
10.description: Ambient electronics, strings and solo cello, melding into an amorphous tonal explorational soundscape. I’ve also included a ‘No Cello’ mix, which transforms the track into atmospheric underscore.

11.author: Scott Buckley
11.title: Intervention
11.description: Darker ambient piano – subtle thriller vibes, with a simpler piano theme which should hopefully work well as underscore. Also included is a ‘no melody’ alternative mix.

12.author: Scott Buckley
12.title: ‘O Come All Ye Faithful
12.description: A cinematic re-orchestration of ‘O Come All Ye Faithful’, with sweeping strings, brass and percussion. Merry Christmas guys! Thanks for an amazing year.

13.author: Scott Buckley
13.title: Snowfall
13.description: A heartfelt reflection of the snowy darkness of Midwinter (at least of what it’s like here in Sweden!). Simple layered pianos, percussive and sustained strings, and synths.

14.author: Scott Buckley
14.title: Extrapolation
14.description: A simple, moody extrapolation of a piano improvisation, featuring atmospheric strings. Slightly uplifting, slightly melancholy.
